## Read in DE data

```{r}
library(here)


dge_files <- list.files(path = here("results"),
                        pattern = "dge.tsv",
                        recursive = TRUE,
                        full.names = TRUE)

dre_files <- list.files(path = here("results"),
                        pattern = "dre.tsv",
                        recursive = TRUE,
                        full.names = TRUE)
```

## Read into a single giant dataframe

```{r}
dge <- vroom::vroom(dge_files, id = "fpath", delim = "\t")
dre <- vroom::vroom(dre_files, id = "fpath", delim = "\t")
```
